name: 2021 10th International Conference on Software and Computer Applications
content: Publicationï¼š You are invited to submit manuscript to ICSCA 2021\. The accepted paper will be included into ICSCA 2021 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). The ISBN number assigned to ICSCA 2021 is 978-1-4503-8882-5
